line_2: Just then Remembrance seem'd to say,
Grim Pluto smil'd; all Hell look'd gay;

line_1: What the Fine Gentlemen wore Yesterday:
line_2: Unlucky, as Fungoso in the Play,

line_1: What the Fine Gentlemen wore Yesterday:
line_2: These Sparks with aukward Vanity display
Was all so giggling, and so gay,
